service.name: Missing Persons List
service.documentation: Returns a list of uuid's of all missing persons.

service.name: Found Persons List
service.documentation: Returns a list of uuid's of all non-missing persons.

service.name: All Person All Status All Triage
service.documentation: Returns an array of (uuid, person status, triage status) of all persons.

service.name: Person Data
service.documentation: Returns an array of information about a person.
